headers.name: Label
headers.tooltipContent: The technical label that is a specific identifier used to describe data fields, categories, or actions within the database.

headers.name: Friendly Name
headers.tooltipContent: A nontechnical name used to more easily describe and identify the data element for the data dictionary.

headers.name: Description
headers.tooltipContent: Brief description of the element and its uses within the database.

headers.name: Category
headers.tooltipContent: PLACEHOLDER, No obvious Description for this column currently. Information to be filled in later.

headers.name: Source
headers.tooltipContent: Source of the data element in the database. SIS - Student information system used by ASU to store and organize student information. LMS - Learning management system used by ASU by educators to create, manage, and assess educational content.

headers.name: Name
headers.tooltipContent: The name of the tool used to collect the data for the element.

headers.name: Dataset Name
headers.tooltipContent: The name of the dataset that the database element belongs to.
